creator: jason@codebarn.org
text:
org.apache.tools.ant.DefaultLogger version 1.37 throws a NegativeArrayIndex 
exception at line 257.  I changed this:

StringBuffer tmp = new StringBuffer( size );

into this:

StringBuffer tmp = new StringBuffer();

and it builds and runs fine now.  Problem is when the current task name is 
longer than 10 (like PathConvert), it tries to create a StringBuffer with a 
negative length.
